synopsis.text: Although Ye Chong spent his formative years in solitude on a forgotten trash planet, his life takes an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon an extraordinary artificial intelligence mecha, Mu Shang. After narrowly escaping a catastrophic star disaster, the unlikely duo finds themselves entangled in a web of conspiracies and chaos. As they traverse the boundless universe, Ye Chong, once a recluse, encounters diverse individuals and absorbs a wealth of knowledge. Along the way, he uncovers not only the enigmatic past of his robotic companion but also his own mysterious origins. This thrilling adventure promises to reveal the many secrets hidden within the cosmos.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
